an5.116:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam niraye.
an5.116:1.5: ananuvicca apariyogahetva appasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti,
an5.116:1.6: ananuvicca apariyogahetva pasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti,
an5.116:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam niraye.
an5.116:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam sagge.
an5.116:2.5: anuvicca pariyogahetva appasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti,
an5.116:2.6: anuvicca pariyogahetva pasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti,
an5.116:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam sagge”ti.
